name: Unmoor
detailed_description:
visual Novel, Adv, Fantasy, otome

Louisa has spent all her life in the sea with her father sailing on board of a ship called "Diossa" and she had no intention to change it. The only exception she did was when she went to study in the Maritime Acadimy. But, as soon as she returned, she learnt that her father had been deceived by a certain monsieur Andreas Viardo who had taken their ship in his possession. Now she had to get back her "Diossa" .
Particular features:
  • Full character branches
  • Three male characters to choose from
  • The possibility to pass the game without romantic relationships

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.4GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Любая

  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

  • Storage: 400 MB available space
